hero_title.text: Hello, I'm Satyam Mahajan. I'm a full-stack web developer.

about_bio.text: I am a Web Developer/Designer. I have a serious passion for UI effects, animations and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences. As a web developer, I enjoy using my obsessive attention to detail, my unequivocal love for making things, and my mission-driven work ethic to literally change the world. That's why Iâ€™m excited to make a big impact at a high growth company.
I love to keep myself up-to-date with new technologies by educating myself by taking online courses.

project_preview_description.text: A full-stack application for users to purchase books online. Designed for easy library management tasks.
A basic web app designed to store contact details of persons using Firebase data base and Angular framework
A simple HTML file validator that look for markup errors in HTML file.
